/*
Assembly instructions:
add r2, r1, r0
add r3, r2, r1
sub r4, r3, r2
sub r5, r4, r3

Instruction encoding:
opcode| dst | src | src |  padding |
0000000|00000|00000|00000|0000000000|

Binary instructions:
0000000|00010|00001|00000|0000000000| add r2, r1, r0
0000000|00011|00010|00001|0000000000| add r3, r2, r1
0000001|00100|00011|00010|0000000000| sub r4, r3, r2
0000001|00101|00100|00011|0000000000| sub r5, r4, r3
		|
		v
0000|0000|0010|0000|1000|0000|0000|0000| add r2, r1, r0
0000|0000|0011|0001|0000|0100|0000|0000| add r3, r2, r1
0000|0010|0100|0001|1000|1000|0000|0000| sub r4, r3, r2
0000|0010|0101|0010|0000|1100|0000|0000| sub r5, r4, r3

Hex instructions:
0x00208000 add r2, r1, r0
0x00310400 add r3, r2, r1
0x02418800 sub r4, r3, r2
0x02520c00 sub r5, r4, r3

*/
